tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title (English):** Review of the COVID-19 Sero Surveillance and Research Program and the COVID-19 Immunity Task Force
**Title (French):** Examen du Programme de séro surveillance et de recherche du Groupe de travail sur l’immunité face à la COVID-19

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029625
**Amendment Number:** 0

**Publication Date:** March 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 27, 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)
**Status:** Expired

**Contracting Entity:** Health Canada
**Address:** Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K9, Canada

**Notice Brief:**

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites bids for a contract to design, conduct, and report on a Review of the COVID-19 Sero Surveillance and Research Program and the COVID-19 Immunity Task Force. The successful bidder will provide resource(s) under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) for Solutions-based professional services under stream 2: Business consulting/change management services.

**Key Requirements:**

* Review the COVID-19 Sero Surveillance and Research Program and the COVID-19 Immunity Task Force
* Design and conduct the review
* Report on the findings
* Provide resource(s) under the TSPS SA
* Work off-site at own facilities

**Preferred Skills:**

* Experience in business consulting and change management services
* Project management skills
* Reporting and analytical skills

**Evaluation:**

The bid will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical proposal
* Past experience
* Capacity to meet the requirements of the project

**Notice URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/8f2132954865e34e8366a877870708a8/npp_eng.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/10290b3abedbc9aae14724ea8978c282/npp_fr.pdf (French)

**Contact Information:**

Name: Johnson, Drew
Email: drew.johnson@canada.ca
Phone: 613-941-2102
Contact Information Address: 200 E
